title: Leah38
author: Leah38
created_time: May 18, 2022, 07:07:21 AMLast edit: May 19, 2022, 04:59:11 PM by Leah38
content: FaceDAO WEBSITE |  TELEGRAM |  TWITTER | DISCORD  APP |  COINMARKETCAPFaceDAO is the next generation social media App built on blockchain, providing a trusted and open environment.You can download the APP and connect it with your Twitter account. FaceDAO is developed by a decentralized team from all around the world, Including industry experts, software engineers and business executives from IBM, Google, Apple, Huawei, Tencent, Facebook, who are filled with enthusiasm about future decentralized communities and Web 3.0FaceDAO as Web3 Decentralised Platform‚úîÔ∏è Decentralized platforms like FaceDAO give ownership back to you.‚úîÔ∏è You decide what content is allowed, and own the right to participate in platform governance.‚úîÔ∏è You are the ultimate beneficiary of a decentralized platform. The decentralized community and the token reward mechanism are designed to truly benefit everyone.‚úîÔ∏è The most important output of the platform - your attention - is rewarded back to you as token rewards.Decentralized platforms are built on blockchain, providing trust and transparency to the users.In Short: No data manipulation. No privacy invasion. No shady algorithm.‚úîÔ∏è One person per account, no fake or bot accounts.Governance‚ÄçFACE puts the future of FaceDAO platform directly into the hands of each individual,allowing you to curate the platform, control content parameters and future features.‚ÄçBenefit‚ÄçAll platform revenue is distributed back to each individual FACE holder instantly, depending on the amount of FACE that you hold.In other words, the more FACE, the more benefits.Social to earn‚Äç‚ÄçFACE empowers you to earn your fair share of the benefits of your efforts. Daily visits, likes, comments, sharing, or creating a post, etc., are all automatically rewarded with FACE.FACE DistributionFACE is minted on the Binance Smart Chain as BEP-20 Token with Max supply of 1000 trillion.¬†0xb700597d8425CEd17677Bc68042D7d92764ACF59Community Treasury90% of FACE is owned and controlled by community, and is allocated to reward your contributions to the community, airdrops, community tasks,provide liquidity for trading and maintain a sustainable ecosystem.DevelopmentDeveloping and maintaining a large social platform for millions of users is costly. 10% of FACE is used to provide infrastructure, server and engineer costs.

comments.body: This is a good app. You can post freely at the same time earn tokens.
